definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means

sentences.english: A boy he rutted with once too often returned the favor.
sentences.chinese: 一个他曾经那么宠幸的男孩给了他绝妙的回报。

sentences.english: For this, Chinese famous writer Qian Zhongshu had an excellent moment.
sentences.chinese: 对此，中国著名作家钱钟书先生有一个绝妙的评语。

sentences.english: The dampened cloth makes a great dirt magnet.
sentences.chinese: 一般来说，湿布是一块绝妙的灰尘吸铁石。

sentences.english: Do these 15 Wonderful Words Actually Have No English Equivalent?
sentences.chinese: 这15个绝妙之词真无英语对等语汇？

sentences.english: Jeremy is remembered for his great sense of humour.
sentences.chinese: 人们不会忘记杰里米那绝妙的幽默感。

sentences.english: Grand Mirage Resort is a beach resort with 309 rooms which most them overlooking to the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 在酒店，您可以远眺美丽的山峦和印度洋的绝妙风光。

sentences.english: What he has left us are his overwhelming ideas and his favorite glasses.
sentences.chinese: 他留给我们的是他绝妙的想法和他最喜欢的眼镜。

sentences.english: Another good place to store things is under the bed.
sentences.chinese: 另一个绝妙的储物地点则是你的床下。

sentences.english: To drill in this area will be a wonderful experience.
sentences.chinese: 在这个地区打井将是一个绝妙的经历。

sentences.english: The body comforts the heart, while the clothes soothes the body. A terrific experience starts right here.
sentences.chinese: 身随心动，衣随身行，绝妙的体验由此开启。

sentences.english: There are a lot of fantastic audiobooks out there.
sentences.chinese: 绝妙的有声书数不胜数。

sentences.english: This is a fun defense game!
sentences.chinese: 一款绝妙的老游戏复刻版。

sentences.english: The new Bwin headquarters faces the Duomo with this marvellous balcony.
sentences.chinese: 新的BWIN总部面对大教堂的绝妙包厢。

sentences.english: Special one-bed room, give couples a romantic experience.
sentences.chinese: 大床房，给恋人绝妙的浪漫体验。

sentences.english: And he says that created this incredible opportunity for drug companies.
sentences.chinese: 他还声称这为制药公司缔造了绝妙机会。

definition: exquisite/fine and delicate (usu. of works of art)
lit. slap the table and shout with praise (idiom); fig. wonderful!/amazing!/great!
to hit on sth new (idiom); to display originality/to adopt an original approach
string of pearl and jade (idiom); ideal combination/perfect pair
